Modification_Detail.description: extracted metadata from PDS3 catalog and modified to comply with PDS4 Information Model

Volume_PDS3.archive_status_note: The database contains a value of NULL. For the purposes of this exercise, the value was replaced with IN_QUEUE
Volume_PDS3.description:
This volume contains the Clementine EDR Images acquired by the Ultraviolet/Visible Camera, Near-Infrared Camera, Long Wavelength Infrared Camera, Laser Image Detection and Ranging Imager (Hi Res) and the Star-Tracker Cameras.
VOLUME 79: REVOLUTION NUMBERS 338, 339, 341, 342
The table shown below provides a timeline for each Clementine lunar orbit for this volume. The table shows the orbit number (ORB), Day of Year (DOY), Date, UTC, Longitude of orbit at the equator (LONG), and altitude at periapsis (ALT).
POST-MAPPING ACTIVITIES -----------------------
ORB DOY DATE UTC LONG ALT 338 121 05/01/94 09:38:0 257.1 372.6 339 121 05/01/94 14:36:2 254.4 372.4 341 122 05/02/94 00:33:2 248.9 371.9 342 122 05/02/94 05:31:5 246.2 371.6
